text: George L. Cox (1878–1947) was an American actor and film director.Goble p.803 ==Selected filmography== * The House of Toys (1920) * The Week-End (1920) * The Blue Moon (1920) * Sunset Jones (1921) * Payment Guaranteed (1921) * Their Mutual Child (1921) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan.
